name: Adrienne Tacke
bio: Adrienne Braganza Tacke is a Filipina software engineer in Las Vegas, the author of the newly released book Coding for Kids: Python, and a dedicated STEM education advocate. As a Code. org volunteer in Las Vegas, she regularly speaks to students of all ages about the power of code and encourages young women and girls to explore a career in software engineering. She enjoys leading by example and sharing her knowledge to help new devs become great ones.

talks.title: Think Coding is Hard? Try Writing a Kids Book For It!
talks.desc: As a software engineer for the last 8 years, I've encountered many technical problems and challenges. The most difficult one? Writing a book to teach kids how to code in Python! I'll give you insights on how I accomplished this monumental task while maintaining a regular 9-5!
